text: Goran Višnjić (born September 9, 1972) is a Croatian actor. He was born in Šibenik, Croatia. Višnjić has appeared in American and British movies and television productions. He is best known in the United States for his role as Dr. Luka Kovač on the NBC television series ER. He plays Garcia Flynn on Timeless, also on NBC. == Other websites == * Category:1972 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Croatian actors Category:Stage actors Category:Living people
title: Goran Višnjić
